item.title: Embeded languages in string values supported by Roslyn
item.description: In a recent post, I shared how to highlight C# code in string values. Roslyn provides more built-in highlighters / code-completions in string values. Most of the supported languages are available as constants of the StringSyntaxAttribute class. To indicate the language, you can use the lang or language comment or the [StringSyntax] attribute. The languages mentioned in this post are handled by Roslyn (VS,â€¦ Link to article: https://www.meziantou.net/embeded-languages-in-string-values-supported-by-roslyn.htm?utm_medium=social&utm_source=syndication
